mapper.insert: insert into free(user_id, free_title, free_content) values (#{user_id}, #{free_title}, #{free_content})
mapper.select: select free_idx, free_title, free_content, user_id, create_date from free where f_del_yn = 'n' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') free_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') free_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') free_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or free_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1 order by free_idx DESC limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select count(free_idx) from free where f_del_yn = 'n' and user_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') free_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') free_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') free_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or free_content like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') 1=1
